answers.answer: Gestational diabetes has bugging to do with reg diabetes. Its just something that some women develope during pregnancy then goes away. But most likely you don't have diabetes at all or your blood work would have showed it and doctor would have told you. :-)
Your placenta (if you have GD) does something with the insulin so once your placenta is out it's gone

question: If u Dnt have have gestational diabetes does that mean u also Dnt have the real one too
title: gestational diabetes
